channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report I-2024020066
item.description:
Report I-2024020066

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-14
  • City: Springdale
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 02/14/2024 a shipment was discovered to contain hidden DG during inspection process at the DHL FYV service center, located at 327 E Robinson Ave, Springdale AR 72764. Transportation by road has been confirmed.

item.title: Report X-2024020566
item.description:
Report X-2024020566

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-31
  • City: PINE BLUFF
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Car appeared to have been hard coupled from humping operations that caused a crumpling of the B end left side pushing the truck assembly up to the first hopper. This crumpling caused a tear in the side of the car approximately 1' long by 1-2" wide.
